Notes: A variant of SimpleMapObj that gets rendered after most other objects. This is a generic map object with a model and collision. It also supports BCK, BTK, BTP, BRK and BVA animations. Animations must have the same name as the model in order to be played. The animations will start playing once the object loads. Also supports color change (ColorChange.brk) and texture change (TexChange.btk/.btp) animations as well as shadows (Shadow.bcsv). Lastly, it also supports an optional Bloom model.

Obj_arg0.Name: Color Frame
Obj_arg0.Description: If ColorChange.brk exists, this will define the color frame to be used.

Obj_arg1.Name: Texture Frame
Obj_arg1.Description: If TexChange.btp/.btk exists, this will define the texture frame to be used.

Obj_arg2.Name: Shadow Length
Obj_arg2.Description: If Shadow.bcsv exists, this defines the shadow's drop length.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene.
